thread.section_title: Edrugstore.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Edrugstore.com | edrugstore.com
thread.title: Marc

author: Marc
title: Marc
text:
The ordering process is simple and efficient. They followed up quickly with a phone call to confirm medical eligibility. The prescription arrived in a timely manner.
The product, however, is crazy expensive and seems to go up in price almost monthly. Admittedly, this may be the fault of the manufacturer and not the pharmacy.
The only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is that the shipping costs were quite high for standard shipping on three little pills. Makes one wonder if they inflate the shipping charge to get back the promotional discount they usually offer.
